ComicInfo.Summary: Pieces of Dr. Marcel Petiot's past are slowly exposed—revealing harrowing events and actions that peer into the mind of a madman. As the detectives begin an intense interrogation with the killer's wife, the Nazi occupation progresses—and the fate of Paris is determined.
